name: vsts-developer-tools
description: Visual Studio Team Services Extension Developer Tools

scripts.initdev: npm run initdev:npm  && npm run initdev:typings
scripts.content:all: npm run content:web && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension
scripts.prelink:tasks: mkdirp dist/_temp/node_modules && pushd "dist/_temp" && npm install vsts-task-lib -s && popd
scripts.build:tasks: npm run clean && npm run compile:tasks && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension && npm run link:tasks
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run compile:web && npm run compile:tasks && npm run content:all && npm run link:tasks
scripts.package:all: tfx extension create --root dist --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension*.json

author: Microsoft Corporation
